hero.tagline: Tailored Software Solutions for Your Business
hero.title: Custom Digital Solutions for Small Businesses
hero.description: Transform your unique business challenges into competitive advantages. We build custom software specifically designed for your workflows, team, and growth goals. No one-size-fits-all solutions—just tools that work exactly how you need them to.

vision.title: Software Built Around Your Business
vision.description: Every small business is unique. That's why we create custom digital solutions that align perfectly with your specific processes, challenges, and objectives.

affordable.title: Precision-Built for Your Needs
affordable.description: Unlike generic software that forces you to adapt, our custom solutions are designed around your existing workflows. Get exactly what you need—nothing more, nothing less.

lightweight.title: Optimized for Small Teams
lightweight.description: We specialize in creating efficient, focused tools for small businesses. Our solutions are powerful yet simple, designed to enhance your team's productivity without overwhelming them.

timeSaving.title: Automation That Understands You
timeSaving.description: We analyze your repetitive tasks and create intelligent automation tailored to your business logic. Free your team to focus on growth and innovation.

mission.title: Empowering Small Teams to Make Big Leaps
mission.description: We understand the challenges freelancers and startups face. We create tools that streamline your work so you can focus on your core business.

saveTime.title: Time is Money
saveTime.description: Automate those daily repetitive tasks. Use the saved time to meet more customers.

workRight.title: Do It Right from the Start
workRight.description: Follow industry standards without complexity. Even beginners can work like professionals.

boost.title: Small Team, Big Results
boost.description: Whether working solo or in a small team, produce results that rival large enterprises.

portfolio.title: Solutions We've Built
portfolio.description: Custom software solutions deployed for real businesses. Each project tailored to solve specific challenges and deliver measurable results.

inventory.name: Smart Inventory Tracker
inventory.description: Real-time inventory management system preventing stockouts and reducing waste.
inventory.title: Smart Inventory Management
inventory.problem: Manual Excel tracking causing stock-outs and overordering
inventory.solution: Custom dashboard with automated reorder alerts and supplier integration
results: 3 hours daily saved on manual inventory checks

scheduling.name: Automated Scheduler
scheduling.description: Smart scheduling system eliminating double-bookings and no-shows.
scheduling.title: Automated Service Booking
scheduling.problem: Double bookings and customer frustration with 15% no-show rate
scheduling.solution: Custom booking system with SMS reminders and route optimization

reporting.name: Business Intelligence Dashboard
reporting.description: Automated reporting with real-time KPI tracking from multiple data sources.
reporting.title: Instant Business Intelligence
reporting.problem: Hours spent creating weekly reports from multiple data sources
reporting.solution: Automated dashboard pulling data from all systems with one-click reports

contract.name: Contract Management System
contract.description: Centralized contract repository with automated alerts and workflows.
contract.title: Contract Management System
contract.problem: Lost contracts, missed renewal dates, and manual tracking across departments
contract.solution: Centralized contract repository with automated alerts and approval workflows

delivery.name: Delivery Management Kiosk
delivery.description: Self-service kiosk system with barcode scanning and automated notifications.

parking.name: AI Parking Management
parking.description: Computer vision system with real-time occupancy tracking and dynamic pricing.

ordermap.name: Global Order Display Map
ordermap.description: Real-time world map visualizing live orders with analytics and trends.

travel.name: Reverse Auction Travel Platform
travel.description: Platform where hotels bid for travelers with transparent pricing system.

indoor.name: Indoor Map & Navigation Editor
indoor.description: Visual map editor with pathfinding algorithm for indoor navigation.

payment.name: Monthly Card Payment System
payment.description: Automated recurring billing with card-on-file and smart retry logic.

survey.name: Survey & Analytics Platform
survey.description: Survey creation and analysis with real-time insights and automated reporting.

quote.name: Professional Quote Generator
quote.description: Automated quote creation with templates and client approval tracking.
quote.title: Professional Quote Generator
quote.problem: Manual quote creation taking hours with inconsistent pricing
quote.solution: Automated quote generation with templates and client approval tracking

requirements.name: Requirements Management Platform
requirements.description: Centralized platform for software requirements with version control.
requirements.title: Software Requirements Platform
requirements.problem: Requirements scattered across emails, docs, and meetings causing project delays
requirements.solution: Centralized platform with version control and stakeholder collaboration

products.title: Tools We've Built for You
products.description: Ready-to-use SaaS products designed for small businesses and freelancers. Sign up and start using immediately.

requirements.name: Requirements Management Tool
requirements.description: From organizing client requirements to project documentation - all in one place. With AI assistance, reduce documentation time by 80%.

quotation.name: Quotation Management Tool
quotation.description: Create professional quotes quickly and easily. Start with templates, complete in minutes, and send directly to clients.

billsplit.name: Bill Split (Mobile)
billsplit.description: Free mobile app for splitting bills with friends. Scan receipts, split instantly, and send payment requests.

cta.title: Ready for Software That Works Your Way?
cta.description: Join thousands of small businesses using custom-built solutions that perfectly match their needs. Let's discuss how we can transform your unique challenges into streamlined workflows.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Growing Businesses
testimonials.description: See what our real customers say about working with KoosLab.

workspace.quote: Excellent manual work! Very satisfied with communication style! Great work efficiency! They paid attention to even the smallest details.
workspace.author: Ronald Yang

bunnyrate.quote: They clearly understand customer requirements and focus on solving fundamental problems. No complaints whatsoever.
bunnyrate.author: Nicholas Yang

healthcare1.quote: We've significantly reduced resources needed for daily repetitive tasks. No longer need to worry about human error in repetitive work.
healthcare1.author: Ember Noh

healthcare2.quote: This will greatly help improve work quality. Thank you for the immediate and accurate responses to feedback during collaboration.
healthcare2.author: Ember Noh

aicompany1.quote: They worked hard to understand our requirements specifically and accurately. They even checked things we hadn't thought of.
aicompany1.author: Mihyun Park

aicompany2.quote: Quick solution review and response. They penetrated deep into the solutions we were investigating.
aicompany2.author: Mihyun Park

safety1.quote: We gained a systematic understanding of IT and SW product development processes. Especially realized the importance of User Stories and wireframes in early stages.
safety1.author: Hyejoung Lee

safety2.quote: Very fast progress, responses, and feedback with clear professionalism. Made the project enjoyable to work on together.
safety2.author: Hyejoung Lee

safety3.quote: Fast and clear communication made everything smooth from workshop preparation to completion. Discovered pages and features we hadn't thought of.
safety3.author: Jenny Wang

safety4.quote: The prioritization work was especially beneficial. We could quickly organize high-priority development requirements.
safety4.author: Jenny Wang

logistics1.quote: Very satisfied with proactive communication between IT development and field staff, providing advanced solutions and catching errors we hadn't considered.
logistics1.author: James

logistics2.quote: Both customers and employees are satisfied, greatly increasing trust in KoosLab. If you maintain this dedication, you'll achieve great success.
logistics2.author: James

association1.quote: Despite having no technical knowledge or background in website creation, the User Story templates provided were extremely helpful.
association1.author: Jinkyung Kim

association2.quote: Thank you so much for the detailed explanations through multiple online meetings, which were incredibly helpful.
association2.author: Jinkyung Kim
